alert.note: Alert for Linn; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 06 at 10:15AM CDT until August 07 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Grand River near Chillicothe affecting Linn MO and Livingston Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Grand River near Chillicothe. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Low-lying cropland floods. At 28.0 feet, Rural roads are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 26.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 4.4 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue 1pm 1pm 1pm Grand River Chillicothe 24.0 26.7 Sun 9am 24.0 12.1 9.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
